languages.text: "Нет жертвы ценнее, чем та, что принесена в дар Поиску Знаний".
"There is no sacrifice more worthy than one made in the name of the Quest for Knowledge."
languages.original_text: "Нет жертвы ценнее, чем та, что принесена в дар Поиску Знаний".

traits.locale_text: "There is no sacrifice more worthy than the one done in the name of the Search for Knowledge."
"There is no sacrifice more worthy than the one done in the name of the Search for Knowledge."
"There is no sacrifice more worthy than one made in the name of the Quest for Knowledge."
"There is no sacrifice more worthy than the one done in the name of the Search for Knowledge."
"There is no sacrifice more worthy than the one done in the name of the Search for Knowledge."
"There is no sacrifice more worthy than one made in the name of the Quest for Knowledge."
"There is no sacrifice more worthy than one made in the name of the Quest for Knowledge."
"There is no sacrifice more worthy than one made in the name of the Quest for Knowledge."

languages.text: “为求知远征而做出的牺牲是最有价值的牺牲。”
languages.original_text: "There is no sacrifice more worthy than one made in the name of the Quest for Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: “为求知远征而做出的牺牲是最有价值的牺牲。”
“为寻求知识而做出的牺牲是最有价值的牺牲。”

languages.text: «No hay sacrificio más digno que el que se hace en nombre de la búsqueda del conocimiento».
languages.original_text: "There is no sacrifice more worthy than one made in the name of the Quest for Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: «No hay sacrificio más digno que el que se hace en nombre de la búsqueda del conocimiento».

languages.text: 「聖なる知識探求の名の下で払われる犠牲は、何よりも価値があるのだ」
languages.original_text: "There is no sacrifice more worthy than one made in the name of the Quest for Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: 「知識の探求の名の下で払われる犠牲は、何よりも価値があるのだ」
「知識の探求の名の下で払われる犠牲は、何よりも価値があるのだ」

languages.text: « Il n'est pas de sacrifice plus digne que celui fait au nom de la quête de la Connaissance. »
languages.original_text: "There is no sacrifice more worthy than one made in the name of the Quest for Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'est pas de sacrifice plus digne que celui fait au nom de la quête de la Connaissance. »

languages.text: "Kein Opfer kann würdiger sein als das Opfer, das im Namen der Suche nach Wissen erbracht wird."
languages.original_text: "There is no sacrifice more worthy than one made in the name of the Quest for Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Kein Opfer kann würdiger sein als das Opfer, das im Namen der Suche nach Wissen erbracht wird."
"Kein Opfer kann würdiger sein als das Opfer, das im Namen der Suche nach Wissen erbracht wird."

languages.text: "İrfan Arayışı uğruna yapılan fedakârlıktan daha kıymetlisi yoktur."
languages.original_text: "There is no sacrifice more worthy than one made in the name of the Quest for Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "İrfan Arayışı uğruna yapılan fedakârlıktan daha kıymetlisi yoktur."
